Package gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.ferret.server

Class Summary
Cache This class manages cached file in a queue.
EnvironmentModule This module tries to detect the environment variables.
FerretAnalysisModule This module runs a Ferret analysis task and returns a handle to the results.
FerretCacheModule This module manages data caching which includes dataset caching, binary subset caching and meta data caching.
FerretDataInfo This class holds information about a dataset
FerretDODSModule Provides DODS metadata and subsets for Ferret data objects.
FerretImportModule Creates data handles for Ferret datasets specified by XML configuration tags in the configuration file "fds.xml".
FerretTaskModule A task module to invokes Ferret as an external process.
FerretTempHandle Implementation of the TempDataHandle interface for Ferret datasets.
FerretTool This class is the main interface between Ferret server and Anagram.
FerretUpdateModule Updates a data handle to be in synch with the actual data source.
FerretXMLReader A helper class to handle XML output by Ferret server
RuntimeEnvironment The class represents a set of modifiable environment variables.
Task A wrapper for invoking an external process.
